welcome_message_body: Welcome to El Geneina, Sudan! Get ready to immerse yourself in the charming atmosphere of this historic city, known for its vibrant markets and beautiful landscapes. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that El Geneina has to offer.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Geneina Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Geneina Airport is used for shipping and receiving goods and packages.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
